reviewtext: I just got the case.  It has a nice feel to it and is very well  constructed.  I'm happy with the purchase.  This price is very  good.ProsHeavy Duty Zipper.Well made.Great  protection.StylishConsNo belt clip.  I don't really miss it but it  would be nice to free up my hands and stick it on my belt.  (but then  again, I will look less like a geek.)Makes Palm III more bulky.  Difficult to keep in pocket.Not much room inside to store anything  besides a business card and a couple of scraps of paper.Velcor mount for  Palm III not very secure.
summary: Nice case.  Wish it had a belt clip
